lp_series_048.smk_title: Redis Event Streaming: Protocol Mismatch & Windows Compatibility

lps.title: Upstash REST API RPUSH/LPOP Pattern
lps.insight: Use RPUSH (persistent queue) instead of PUBLISH (ephemeral) for reliable message delivery with Upstash Cloud REST API.
lps.context: Redis event streaming between CSN Server and Ubuntu Playground using Upstash Cloud REST API

lps.title: Python Windows Emoji Handling
lps.insight: Replace all emoji characters (‚úÖ‚ùåüì•üöÄ) with ASCII text ([PASS], [FAIL], etc.) to prevent UnicodeEncodeError on Windows cp1252.
lps.context: Windows cp1252 encoding crashes when printing emojis in Python console output

lps.title: Redis Subscriber Array Unwrapping
lps.insight: When using json=[data] in RPUSH, Upstash returns array. Subscriber must check isinstance(data, list) and unwrap before processing.
lps.context: Upstash REST API wraps JSON messages in arrays when published with json parameter

lps.title: GENOMOS Consultation Gene Schema
lps.insight: Consultation events should be logged as GeneType.CONSULTATION with fields: question, requester, agents, agent_count, essence_of_truth, timestamp.
lps.context: Integration between Redis event system and GENOMOS blockchain for consultation tracking

lps.title: Daemon Thread Silent Failures
lps.insight: Emoji crashes in background thread startup logs cause silent failure. Test threads with ASCII-only output first.
lps.context: Python daemon threads on Windows failing silently due to emoji encoding in print statements

lp_series_049.smk_title: Orion's Test Tasks + SMK V2.0 Implementation (Week 1)

lps.title: Emoji Crashes Hide Daemon Thread Failures
lps.insight: On Windows, emoji print statements in background threads cause silent failures (UnicodeEncodeError). Replace with ASCII before debugging thread issues.
lps.context: Debugging Redis subscriber thread that appeared broken but was actually running with silent emoji crashes

lps.title: Test Infrastructure Before Testing Features
lps.insight: All 3 Orion tests initially failed due to infrastructure bugs (emoji encoding, array unwrapping, missing GENOMOS integration). Test the testing infrastructure first.
lps.context: Validation suite failed not due to feature bugs but testing infrastructure issues

lps.title: Triadiske Portvokter Validation Pattern
lps.insight: To test 3-layer gates: (1) BiofeltGate with HRV<40, (2) ThalosFilter with SQL injection, (3) MutationLog with normal write. Verify GENOMOS logging for all 3 outcomes.
lps.context: Testing framework for validating Homo Lumen's consciousness-conscience-memory architecture

lps.title: SMK V2.0 Provenance Formula Syntax
lps.insight: Notion API formula syntax is complex and error-prone. Add formulas manually via UI instead of programmatically (saves debugging time).
lps.context: Attempting to programmatically add 9 properties to SLL database via Notion API

lps.title: Session Continuity Protocol
lps.insight: When continuing from previous session with summary: (1) Verify infrastructure state, (2) Run validation tests, (3) Document findings before proceeding. Don't assume previous state is still valid after restart.
lps.context: Session resumed after PC restart with infrastructure bugs that weren't present before

lps.title: GENOMOS as Living Audit Trail
lps.insight: Blockchain growth (16‚Üí19 blocks) during testing session provides retrospective validation. Consultation + mutation genes create permanent record of infrastructure validation.
lps.context: GENOMOS blockchain automatically captured testing session as consultation and mutation genes

lps.title: Notion Schema Migration Strategy
lps.insight: When adding 9+ properties: (1) Dry-run first, (2) Add non-formula properties via API, (3) Add formulas manually via UI. Reduces API error complexity.
lps.context: Adding temporal dynamics properties to SLL database as part of SMK V2.0 implementation

metadata.notes: All LPs are from Technical domain with 60-day half-life. VE links reference pilot entries created in Week 3.
